ns2:course.label: Elementary Zulu II
ns2:course.description: Continuation of ZULU 201 with introduction of more advanced grammar; emphasis on more fluency in speaking, reading, and writing simple sentences in standard Zulu. Same as AFST 252. Participation in the language laboratory is required. Prerequisite: ZULU 201.
ns2:course.courseSectionInformation: Same as AFST 252. Participation in the language laboratory is required. Prerequisite: ZULU 201.
